'''Robert Inglis''' is a journalist, actor, theater critic, and playwright who read the Recorded Books Inc. recording of both ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Hobbit]]''.  He was praised by ''AudioFile'' that "''His rich sound and grave manner would make a grocery list sound like a collection of rare treasure''".

==Roles==
* [[1998]]: [[An Awfully Big Adventure]] (TV Series documentary) 
* [[2002]]: ''[[The Hobbit]]'' (audiobook, unabridged): Narrator
* [[2002]]: ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' (audiobook, unabridged): Narrator
* [[2002]]: ''[[The Two Towers]]'' (audiobook, unabridged): Narrator
* [[2002]]: ''[[The Return of the King]]'' (audiobook, unabridged): Narrator
